body:
In C++ or Python following expressions are pretty normal and intuitive:

```python
countNegatives = 0
for n in myNumbers:
    countNegatives += int(n < 0)
```

Or also:

```python
packed = 0
packedResults = []
for i, x in enumerate(myNumbers):
    packed |= int(minValue < x < maxValue) << i
    if i == 64:
        packedResults.append(packed)
        i = 0
if i > 0:
     packedResults.append(packed)
```
